meanings.definition: The part of a metal type projecting beyond the body or shank.
meanings.sent1: The kern of the letter 'f' sticks out.
meanings.sent2: The printer adjusted the kern for better alignment.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf tried to balance on the kern of the 't'.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas extended beyond the kern of conventional thinking.
meanings.sent5: The kern, like a tiny flag, waved proudly on the letter 'j'.

meanings.definition: To form or crop (metal type) with a kern.
meanings.sent1: She carefully kerned the letters for a polished look.
meanings.sent2: Graphic designers often kern text for better readability.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully kerned the words on the menu.
meanings.sent4: His attention to detail kerned the project into perfection.
meanings.sent5: Kerning the text made the document more professional.
